mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sn.id AS id, sn.title AS title, sn.createTime AS time, "1" AS type FROM sys_news sn WHERE sn.`status` = 0 UNION SELECT aa.id AS id, aa.title AS title, aa.createTime AS time, "2" AS type FROM act_activity aa WHERE aa.`status` = 0 ) t ORDER BY t.time DESC LIMIT 5
